refnamediv.refpurpose: extract a rectangle from a black and white bw file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Bwrect extracts a rectangular region from a black and white bw5 format file. The program prompts for the area to extract in x and y pixels, the scanline length of the input file in pixels, and the origin in the input file from which to extract. First quadrant coordinates and file storage format are used.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: We ought to allow the questions to be answered on the command line so that shell scripts, etc., could use this.
